name: Guelph General Hospital
comment:
Comprehensive acute care facility that provides inpatient and outpatient services
  • emergency department with separate emergency mental health unit
  • dietetics and nutritional counselling
  • family birthing unit
  • rehabilitation therapies
  • sexual assault and domestic violence treatment
  • social work and discharge planning
  • spiritual and religious care


Services and Programs:
  • Diagnostic Imaging
  • Emergency Department
  • Guelph Wellington Care and Treatment Centre for Sexual Assault and Domestic Violence
  • Laboratory
  • Lifeline
  • Ontario Breast Screening Program
  • Sleep Lab
